alt.description: Alternate text for screen readers. Leave blank for decorative images.
alt.description_zh: 屏幕阅读器的备用文本。 留空用于装饰性图像。

aspect-ratio.description: Calculated as width/height, so for a 1920x1080px image, the value is 1.7778. If omitted, it will be calculated automatically.
aspect-ratio.description_zh: 计算为 width/height，因此对于 1920x1080px 的图片，其值为 1.7778。 如果省略，将自动计算。

content-class.description: Apply a custom class to the internal content element.
content-class.description_zh: 将自定义类应用于内部内容元素。

cover.description: Adjust the background image to cover the entire container.
cover.description_zh: 调整背景图像以覆盖整个容器。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制在装入组件时呈现组件的内容。如果您的内容不会在 DOM 中呈现，而您希望为 SEO 进行抓取，这将非常有用。

gradient.description: The gradient to apply to the image. This can be any valid CSS gradient declaration. You can find more information on the MDN documentation for gradients.
gradient.description_zh: 要应用于图像的渐变。这可以是任何有效的 CSS 渐变声明。你可以在渐变的 MDN 文档中找到更多信息。

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

inline.description: Display as an inline element instead of a block, also disables flex-grow.
inline.description_zh: 显示为内联元素而不是块，也会禁用 flex-grow。

lazy-src.description: Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filter applied.Use vuetify-loader to generate automatically. NOTE: This prop has no effect unless either height or aspect-ratio are provided.
lazy-src.description_zh: 等待主图像加载时要显示的内容，通常是 base64 编码的小缩略图。应用了轻微的模糊滤镜。使用 vuetify-loader 自动生成。注意：除非提供高度或纵横比，否则此道具无效。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of the component.

options.description: The option passed to the Intersection observer constructor.
options.type: { root: any; rootMargin: any; threshold: any }
options.description_zh: 传递给 Intersection observer 构造函数的选项。

src.description: The URL of the image. Required attributes.
src.type: string | { src: string; srcset: string; lazySrc: string; aspect: number }

srcset.description: A set of alternate images to use based on the size of the device. Read more....
srcset.description_zh: 根据设备大小使用的一组备用图像。Read more….

transition.description: The transition to use when switching from lazy-src to src. Can be one of the built in or custom transition.
transition.description_zh: 从 lazy-src 切换到 src 时要使用的转换。可以是内置过渡或自定义过渡之一。

width.description: Sets the width of the component.
